lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by women who work hard to make a better life for themselves, and I would like to help them achieve their goals.

lender.name: Mark Edward
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in the United States and to have so many opportunities open to me. I am pleased to see the spirit of entrepreneurship grow in other parts of the world and want to see others succeed in fulfilling their dreams and making better lives for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of writers, editors and graphic designers in the software development business. My skills are in people and project management as well as in having a keen understanding of the proper use and application of the English language.

lender.name: Daniel

lender.occupational_info: I work, mainly, in the Electronic Communications field in State Government. This includes web communications and strategic policy as well as other new media (video/images) and IT policy/implementation.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I am proud to help those who work so hard to help themselves. I look forward to their continued success.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I see the opportunity to assist others in this interactive way as being a much more 'hands' on investment than simply sending funds somewhere and never thinking about the donation again.
lender.occupational_info: Administration of government grant programs and projects in Canada.

lender.name: Helen & Gene

lender.name: Jeanne and Tom
lender.loan_because: A mother's day gift from my daughter!

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because: It feels good! Helping to relieve the suffering of others is fundamentally a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I sail as a chief mate on a merchant ship, carrying all types of containerized goods from the west coast of the U.S. to Hawaii and sometimes to Guam and China as well. I'm responsible for the maintenance of the hull, deck and cargo holds. I oversee the loading of cargo in order to ensure the vessel's stability and that the cargo is properly segregated and secured. I ensure all crew are properly trained by planning and running weekly drills. It's a demanding position, sometimes satisfying, sometimes frustrating, always challenging.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: I loan beacause I am inspired by the stories. I have also had my own business and being able to help someone else grow their business is important to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company the produces and sells high end sleepwear.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I wanted to make this loan in honor of my father, who recently passed away, because he believed so deeply in the power of positive social action from the ground up.

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: I have been in a place that $25 or so would have made a huge difference. Now that I can, I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medical center with 45 doctors. I am in charge of billing and coding as well as teaching.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Kenya. It was a great experience and I'll always do what I can to support things happening there.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I'd like to share a little of what I have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I work in city government. My job is to help the police improve their customer service.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need. I spend more than I should on things that don't matter. I hope that I can give more in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an university and I make sure the students who live on campus learns about life outside of academics. I also teach.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: There once was a time when I had nothing, due to some bad choices I had made. Then I accepted Jesus Christ as my personal savior and he started helping me make better choices. His ministry was all about helping others and I want to pattern my life after his.
lender.occupational_info: Jesus Christ was born to a virgin, he lived a perfect sinless life and when his work on earth was through he died on the cross for our sins, but thats not all, on the third day he rose again and is alive forever more. If you trust what Jesus did and you accept that you can't do it on your own then you are saved from your sins and will see him in heaven one day.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to understand biology.

lender.name: Marie and Vince
lender.loan_because: We heard about this on "60 Minutes" and were quite intrigued by the idea of loaning a small amount of money and making a big difference. We believe we are citizens of the world; while $25 may not make much impact on an American in need, that small amount translates into big possibilities for our brothers and sisters around the globe. Peace.
lender.occupational_info: Marie teaches college English, and Vince is an instructional designer and online college professor.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I'd love to help people fulfill their dreams and take control of their own destinies.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an actor in television and film, as well as a script writer. I'm learning how to become a film producer.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-lending can be an incredible tool for lifting people out of poverty. Micro-lending is not new. It's been happening for decades and the concept is proven. It really works.
lender.occupational_info:
Marketing Professional with 1.5 decades of experience in strategic direct marketing.
I view marketing as more science than art. I'm far more interested in direct response marketing than in branding. I employ a methodical, disciplined approach that is always driven by the bottom line.
It starts with an idea - driven by strategic company needs. I believe in testing ideas at the smallest feasible scale, followed by careful measurement. Test, measure, refine, scale, repeat.
Over the last 5 years, I've gravitated to web marketing. Search marketing has become, by far, the most cost-effective advertising channel in the history of the planet. From a marketer's perspective it's the holy grail because your market self-identifies. It's a dream come true when your market tells you (by the keywords they search for) that they are looking for what you are selling.
For more on my marketing philosophy and experience, visit http://www.jaycasper.net.
Some websites I have worked on:
http://www.jaycasper.net http://www.heritage-education.com http://www.uscareerinstitute.com http://www.mckinleycollege.com http://www.slopetracker.com http://www.golftrackergps.com http://www.denverpsychologist.com http://www.fineprintimaging.com

lender.name: jenny
lender.loan_because: i see my mom in each of them.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I believe that I can have an impact on someone's life by lending money to someone with a dream and mission.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: the cycle of poverty can only be broken when opportunities are given to those who need them most.
lender.occupational_info: I work for ChildReach Ministries serving the poorest of the poor in Peru and Ecuador

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work in a jail guarding inmates

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: In this small way I make the world a better and fairer place.
lender.occupational_info: I help people achieve their fitness goals by helping them purchase gyms, treadmills, and other fitness equipment.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I want to see people succeed!

lender.name: Raji
lender.loan_because: I want to help women to get all the help possible to make progress in their lives.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Good karma. I've been blessed with good fortune and I want to give back to others.

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: I make soap.

lender.name: Evan1987
lender.loan_because: I want to see change in peoples lives. I want to see world poverty end before we save trees and rain forest. I want to see the 2nd coming. I want to make a difference. I want to bless someone. Both the lendee along with myself want to see success.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a grocery store/ super market and I deal with the money. I am a cashier. I know where a lot of our fruits and vegetables come from and it is from hard working people in other countries.

lender.name: Kaz
lender.occupational_info: I help others beautify their world.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I like to help entrepreneurs in developing countries who wouldn't otherwise have access to capital.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies on how to hire, develop, and retain their most important assets: their employees.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need a lift up and am glad to be in a position where the contribution is possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small call center for Wells Fargo with 6 other people. I love my job and get to talk to retirees all day, helping them with their accounts and making sure they receive their pension payments on time.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves. My hope is that their success will be paid forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who support individuals with mental and physical disabilities spend their money wisely so they can stay in business and expand to help more people with disabilities.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: because I can...
lender.occupational_info: I do random stuff in musuems and zoos

lender.name: Diane Luu
lender.loan_because: i believe in empowering people.

lender.name: Kaella
lender.loan_because: I want to be apart of the movement to make a difference in a more personal way.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because:
It can help make the world a better place. I was blessed and have more than I need; I need to share that blessing with others.
Learn more about ovarian cancer. Educate for early detection. ovariancancerin.org/
lender.occupational_info: I help people make websites.

lender.name: HAB
lender.loan_because: Because we are the hippest group of Broadcasters on the Planet. Like, what other group of Broadcasters do you know who make loans on Kiva? Some of us don't even tuck in our shirts. That, and we like the idea.
lender.occupational_info: Righteous!

lender.name: Dana & Gary
lender.loan_because: we are just so grateful for our freedom & U.S. military that allow us to be free & share!

lender.name: Linda and Bruce
lender.loan_because: We believe micro credit can make a real and immediate difference in a small company's success, in the lifes the company's employees, and in their community.
lender.occupational_info: Business-to-business magazine publishing for the food and beverage business, and elementary school teacher.

lender.name: marco
lender.loan_because: a loan enabled my education, now I can loan
lender.occupational_info: anesthesia

lender.name: Rosie
lender.loan_because: Everyday acts of mindful solidarity can make a difference to us all.
lender.occupational_info: As IT director for an international development organization I dedicate my energy, strategic thinking and problem-solving skills towards enabling my colleagues to better engage with the communities we support around the world in ways great and small.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: it is my responsibility to help others less fortunate than me. We - those in the west - often live in this truman show like existence, obilivious to the hardships that some people face. I never truly understood this till I saw it first hand. It is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info:
Digital Explorer.Online Marketing Geek. Citizen Journalist. Social Justice Advocate. Political Enthusiast. RSS Junkie. Amateur Blogger. Spiritiual Seeker. Zen Backpacker.
In search of people, passion and purpose.......

lender.name: Familia Extendida
lender.loan_because: as a family we have been blessed with love, ability and relative abundance. Our Kiva account started as a birthday wish, and has continued after the deaths of Armandina and Leonard, both whom set a wonderful example for charity and service. We want to contribute to a better world.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because:
I want to help enable people to improve their lives.
I think this is a great concept because it gives hard-working people access to loans that are (hopefully) more easily repaid. Plus -- once the loans are repaid the money can be re-used to help even more people.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate and I want other women to have a chance to make their lives better.

lender.name: patricia
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and the right to have a good life. Sharing makes the world a better place to live in.
lender.occupational_info: I do accounting for a small business. But over the years I've been a musician, a waitress, cleaned houses and a volunteer for various organizations.

lender.name: Charles Pritchard
lender.loan_because: its helps others out

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide opportunities to people who need them :)
lender.occupational_info: I write instructions for software users.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: This is a very worthy venture.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with children with special needs.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have enough to share with those who have less, and I like the idea of funding people's dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to resolve disputes between my company and it's clients, and to make sure that the clients are treated fairly.

lender.name: Tania and Shane
lender.loan_because: it is helping others in the world that aren't as blessed as us!

lender.name: Mariana
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense.

lender.name: bastakia
lender.loan_because: I would love to help and participate in a small way.

lender.name: Ariella
lender.loan_because: I think about the feeling the recipients get upon receiving news of their loans. It must be amazing.
lender.occupational_info: I read a lot.

lender.name: Alec
lender.loan_because: I like the thought of helping people make better lives for themselves by starting or expanding a business.
lender.occupational_info: I have run my own business for 15 years and have bought and sold several others.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: My parents have showed me how good it feels to help other, and I think this is a great way to help people.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I dream about being an entrepreneur myself... I am so happy to be able to help make that dream a reality for someone else... and in due time my dream will come true as well.
lender.occupational_info: It's hard. Many people do not appreciate the blessings we have here in America and take advantage of what is available to them.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good thing to help families be able to be self-supportive. I want parents to be able to provide for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor for children. I take care of them when they are ill, and teach families how to keep these children healthy. I teach them about good nutrition for children, vaccinations, safety.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people around the world and liked the idea of this wesite.

lender.name: Shoe
lender.loan_because: It's good to know who gets the loan and what's happening to the money.
lender.occupational_info: I write internet applications.

lender.name: Murray
lender.loan_because: I want to do some good for others

lender.name: Kim and Kayla
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help save the United States money by detecting waste and abuse.

lender.name: Bertin & Michelle
lender.loan_because: I love the people of East Africa!

lender.name: Perla
lender.loan_because: we are all one

lender.name: Rach/Cath-ShiningShakti
lender.loan_because: in my world, there's more than enough for everyone -- always. We all deserve abundance and joy while we're here -- as a small business owner I happily receive support while simultaneously supporting others. The Universe is conspiring to shower us with blessings!
lender.occupational_info: Shining Shakti is a line of organic cotton, hand-dyed yoga clothing.

lender.name: rohan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life

lender.name: all of you salon & spa
lender.loan_because: I really believe that to lift one is to lift all. Also, to help others pursuing their dreams encourages me in my own.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make people look and feel their best!

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I think this is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I develop learning solutions

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to build the life they want and if they need help to get started I want to provide the help!

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because:
I care about helping others
Me importa ayudar
lender.occupational_info: I organize special events in Nicaragua

lender.name: Carmen & David
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of creating and seeing opportunities that others have not opened their eyes to see.
lender.occupational_info: We are in the business of empowering humankind.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: The concept of helping people to help themselves is simply a brilliant idea!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I love to help and I love to give. Giving has never been so much fun.

lender.name: Kerri
lender.loan_because: As an business owner, I know how hard it can be to make things work..even in the land of opportunity. I want to encourage others and help them to be able to support their families as much as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer. I take photographs of weddings and special events as well as portraits of kids and families. My dream is to one day have my own photography studio where my husband can work with me.

lender.name: Dorna & Keith
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand, once in a while.

lender.name: Rie
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help people reach for their goals.
lender.occupational_info: My lab I work for is trying to develop vaccines for infectious diseases such as Tularemia, Malaria, and Melioidosis.

lender.name: Grace and Ella
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who may be less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: We are students but we ran a lemonade stand in our neighborhood. We talked with our Mom and Dad about using the money we made to help others in need.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: God has been so good to me, and I feel that he wants me to help others as he has helped me, so that I can show God's love to others through my life.
lender.occupational_info: I help families to get mortgage loans to purchase new homes or to refinance their existing mortgage loans.

lender.name: lsilds
lender.occupation: wife, mother, g-mother, daughter, sister, friend
lender.loan_because: "when ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God." B of M, Mosiah 2:17

lender.name: Aidan
lender.occupational_info: I am a 2nd grade student.

lender.name: Nick & Kerrie
lender.loan_because: It's fun, dude. And hopefully it helps make the world a better place. Maybe someday we'll need a little boost from a friendly lending institution, who knows.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator in a small, project-based learning charter school located in Henderson, Mn. My wife, Kerrie, is an administrative assistant for a telecom firm in Mn. T

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want other people to have the opportunity to improve their lives. I benefited from help when I needed it, and I'm passing it along to others in need.

lender.name: Boris
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: EE student

lender.name: Trudy
lender.loan_because: I think microlending is facinating and love the fact that I can contribute directly.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an AMAZING organization that provides assistant throughout the world, including the area of microlending.

lender.name: LendingHands2U
lender.loan_because: It's such a TINY sacrifice for me to do so much good. In the US, we spend too much on luxuries that we consider necessities. People in other countries have to be far more resourceful and work so much harder for far less. Anything I can do to enable people to gain the factors they need to help themselves, I am glad to do.
lender.occupational_info: I use a computer to make websites that help companies to do their work.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: we need to build a global community where everyone is connected and supported.
lender.occupational_info: I teach graduate students to be psychologists in schools, and help children.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: it mixes financial and social responsibility in one.
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of the money that comes in and out of a business as an accountant. Or I check a business to see if their financial numbers are accurate as an auditor.

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Bruce Wagner
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: I host a television talk show taped in New York City.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Alma
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and business consultant who appreciates the ability to assist other motivated individuals achieve success through hard work and dedication. I love to see the power of the internet and social networking advance society in fundamental benevolent movements such as KIVA. Stand up, Reach out, because...Everyone matters!
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to understand the competitive advantage of a healthy workplace. I use the Denison Culture Survey to provide a current benchmark and road map for future success.

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: I have an entrepreneurial spirit and I want to help others succeed especially those with the odds stacked against them. All of us have a purpose in life and leaving a legacy that you can be proud of is a mission that consumes my spirit. I do not need pats on the back for reaching out and helping someone but I do want to encourage others to give back whether it is in your own community or in the world's community. I am delighted to be able to support the wonderful work of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that builds homes for low income families who have a need for housing. Families must live in overcrowded conditions, live in substandard or inadequate housing or pay 50% of their income for rent. We serve people in the 30-50% of the median income range and they are those who might not ever know the joy of homeownership.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I teach courses in Mathematics and Business.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Micro financing makes a real difference.

lender.name: Cornelia
lender.loan_because: Just because.
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Ibrahim
lender.loan_because: I like to help to make people's lives more easy and secure.
lender.occupational_info: Describing my work to the world: Slowly, slowly, slowly and yes sometimes there is some stress but surely much joy too. Inshallah in the right direction.
